text: The men's 50 metres hurdles event at the 1968 European Indoor Games was held on 10 March in Madrid. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Eddy Ottoz '''' |Günther Nickel '''' |Milan Kotik '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 4 from each heat (Q) qualified directly for the semifinals. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
